charge_type.source: Having pleaded not guilty before a magistrate at his committal on 11 April 2024 to one count of trafficking in dangerous drugs

drugs.source: The defendant was charged with trafficking in the 17.0 grammes of “Ice” and 14.4 grammes of herbal cannabis found inside the Flat
The defendant was charged with trafficking in the 17.0 grammes of “Ice” and 14.4 grammes of herbal cannabis found inside the Flat

roles.source: identifying the applicant’s role as a “storekeeper”

aggravating_factors.source: as trafficking in more than one type of drug was an aggravating factor, the judge enhanced the starting point by 1 month
The judge further found the applicant to be a persistent offender, for which he enhanced the sentence by a further 6 months

mitigating_factors.source: the contention that he consumed a significant portion of the drugs himself... Accordingly, he declined to give the applicant any reduction in sentence for this factor
Acknowledging the applicant’s humble background and the difficulties he had encountered in life, including various health issues

guilty_plea.source: the applicant later indicated that he would plead guilty shortly after trial dates were fixed in the High Court

starting_point.source: adopted a starting point of 7½ years’ imprisonment for trafficking in 17.0 grammes of “Ice”

sentence_after_role.source: Inferred as starting point since role adjustment not provided

notional_sentence.source: enhance the sentence accordingly... by 1 month, taking the total to 8 years and 1 month

final_sentence.source: resulting in a sentence of 6 years and 1 month’s imprisonment
